message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm looking for a price around $20,000 to let it go. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $14,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am still unable to meet at $17,000. I am willing to offer $16,000 for the product.
